```{r}
q1 <- readRDS("Data/190115_190331_stop_data.rda")

```

```{r first.instrument.reading}
#make long format to find min/first date for each measurement 
q1.long <- q1 %>% gather("pollutant", "value", 9:21) 

q1.start.time <- q1.long %>% 
    group_by(pollutant) %>% filter(!is.na(value)) %>% 
    summarise(min(time))

```
